M

main(String[]) - Static method in class game.GameRunner
main method, will create a new GameRunner instance and start the gui
MAX_NUMBER_OF_ACTIONS_PER_TURN - Static variable in class player.PlayerActionManager
The maximum number of actions a Player is allowed to do in one turn
MINIMUM_GRID_HEIGHT - Static variable in class grid.builder.RandomGridBuilderDirector
The minimum (default) height of the grid.
MINIMUM_GRID_WIDTH - Static variable in class grid.builder.RandomGridBuilderDirector
The minimum (default) width of the grid.
MINIMUM_NUMBER_OF_PLAYERS - Static variable in class game.CTFMode
The minimum number of players at the start of CTFMode
move(Direction) - Method in class controllers.MoveController
Move the current player.
MoveAction - Class in player.actions
Move action lets a player move on the grid in a direction.
MoveAction(Direction) - Constructor for class player.actions.MoveAction
Create a new move action to move the player in a specified direction.
MoveController - Class in controllers
This class will handle the move actions of the GUI.
MoveController(IPlayerDataBase) - Constructor for class controllers.MoveController
Create a new move controller with a reference to a given player database.
MovePlayerTest - Class in scenariotests
Tests the "Move" use case.
MovePlayerTest(GameMode) - Constructor for class scenariotests.MovePlayerTest
The constructor will be called by junit for every gamemode.
